title: Research and Innovation—May, 2022
cleaned_text: SELECTED RESEARCH HIGHLIGHTS PROGRAMS AND FUNDING OPPORTUNITIES [Applications are now open for PRogram to Increase Diversity Among Individuals Engaged in Lung and Vascular Health-Related Research (PRIDE AGOLD) Summer Institute (virtual if necessary), research, education and mentoring program sponsored by the NHLBI. This program is dedicated to improving the long-term success of early career faculty from groups underrepresented in the biomedical workforce. For questions, contact ](https://pridecc.wustl.edu/apply) [AGOLD@UCDenver.edu](mailto:AGOLD@UCDenver.edu) or call 303-724-3174. [Learn more](https://pridecc.wustl.edu/programs/agold). [Applications are now open](https://medschool.cuanschutz.edu/accords/research-publications/research-training/primary-care-research-fellowship) for postdoctoral candidates to start in July 2023. The program seeks to enroll two MDs to become primary care research leaders addressing the nation's primary care health delivery challenges.
